title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS: A walk down memory lane via Google street view.  Cookie storage hack for the freezer.  Small space entertaining tips.  Things that fit perfectly together.  I’ve never been to Lodi. The best food TV of 2024.  The science behind nostalgic smells.  I am amazed at these dioramas.  How to attract more hummingbirds to your yard.  Journaling through embroidery.  Time travel- Burger King, NYC 1998. Dog eats with human hands.  Anderson Cooper & Andy Cohen are a dream team.  The world is getting so fancy with soda. What’s the difference between ginger ale & ginger beer?  To prevent garbage disposal damage.  Photos of where your food comes.  Why is it called a pound cake? If you need salad inspiration, I got you!  Weekend reading: A Year in Practice    Need some help processing 2024 and prepping for 2025? Check out the workshops I’m cohosting with MC!  Intention Setting Online Workshop 2025 Saturday, January 11 10 AM-12 PM LIVE  $55 Includes printables!      Here are my pages for December in my Currently Workbook.  The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
